28 February 2024
In the Savlovsk direction, the schedule of electric trains will change in March

Calendar of some suburban trains of the Savlovsky and Belarusian tracks The MWC will change in March due to the modernization of energy facilities at the Verbilki-Savelovo station, as well as the construction of a railway line between the Testov and Begoya stations.

For example, at the Verbilki site, Savlovo Savlovsky, the MWC will continue to work to improve the supply of the cargo line leading to the ports of the north-west. They'll be coming.1-29 Marchwith the exception of weekends and holidays during day technology windows9:40 to 15:10♪ During the period of operation, the trains will be temporarily suspended. In this regard, several trains will follow the route from or to Lobney.

The Moscow Railway asks passengers to understand the work and to see changes in the suburban train schedule. This can be done at stations and stops, on the official website of the RWD and on the pageSavlovo Station♪

RWD

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

20 February 2024
For two days, in Kimrah, the streets of Lunacharsky were closed, bus routes were changed

The Kimre Municipal District Administration informed about the closure of the Lunacharski (from K. Marx to Lenin), from 20 February 2024g to 22 February 2024g, in connection with the repair of the heat trail.

"Transport of the Highway" reports that the pattern of bus routes No. 2k, No. 6k, No. 14k, No. 280k will be changed during this period. The buses will be on Kirova Street.

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

16 February 2024
In the village of Vorontsio of the Kimra District, the first houses have been gas-tified

The Gasprom Gas Distribution Techniques built and commissioned a 1.2-kilometre gas pipeline for the diagnosis of Dr. Vorontsov of the Kimra municipality of Tver province.

The technical capacity to connect to natural gas has been created for all 15 village houses.

“The villagers received 10 requests for speculation. All applications are completed - the gas pipelines are built up to the landings. The first three houses were gasd. The remaining consumers will be connected as soon as they are ready, " noted the Deputy Director-General for Construction and Investment of the Gazprom Gas Distribution Tver Dmitri Danilov.

Source:Gasprom interregions

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

04 February 2024
In the Levober of the city of Kimra, water will be shut off for a whole day.

On February 6th, the city of Kimra will shut off the water all day.

“There will be no cold water supply to the Levoberian part of the city from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. in connection with water repairs”, as stated in the announcement of the water canal.

The State unitary enterprise Kimra ' s Vodocanal requests the residents to make the necessary water for the entire day.

News ServiceHe's the city of Kimra.

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

31 January 2024
In the Savlovsk direction, the schedule of electric trains will change in February

The schedule of some suburban trains on the Savlovsk, Belarusian and Kazan directions of the MWC will change in February 2024 in connection with the upgrading of infrastructure on selected sites. That's what the company says.

For example, on the reconstructed single-track Canalstroy, the Tald of the Dmitrov section, Savelovo, where additional infrastructure is being developed to increase the capacity of the line,1-13 Februaryexcept on weekends, between09:40 to 15:30travel is planned.

In two other radial areas, Dmitrov, Kanalstroy and the Verbilki competition, the modernization of energy facilities will continue in February.

During the period of operation, traffic on three sections will be temporarily suspended. In this regard, several trains of diametric routes, as well as long-distance of the Savlovski track, will follow the route from or to Lobni.

Russian Railways

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

16 January 2024
The schedule of suburban trains of the Savlovsk MoW will change from 17 January

Calendar of some suburban trains of the Savlovsky and Belarusian tracks The MWC will change from 17 January due to the modernization of energy facilities at the Dimitrov station, Verbilki.

This will increase the energy supply of the cargo line leading to the ports of the north-west. In the MWC, an additional infrastructure is being built on the Dmitrov-Savelovo crossing.

The new mobile infrastructure at the MWF border will increase the bandwidth capacity by almost four times, to 27 trains per day.

Technological " windows " were appointed on 17, 19, 22, 24, 26, 29 and 31 January, from 9:30 to 15:10. During the period of operation, the movement of trains at the Dmitrov crossing will be suspended. In this regard, several trains follow a shorter route from or to Lobney.

The Moscow Railway asks passengers to understand the work and to see changes in the suburban train schedule. This can be done at stations and stops, on the official web site of the RWD and on our portal in section "Calendar of electric trains"

RWD

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

15 January 2024
In the South settlement in Kimrah, buses don't go to the end of the waterway accident.
Photo: Sergei Nikolayevich/South village (DOC)


In the city of Kimra Tver province, the stop was flooded with water because of the blowing pipe. This has been reported in local communities.

The accident occurredIn the village of South, where on the final local bus the second day of water flows. According to the locals, there's a bus stuck over the plug, so now public transport is temporarily off to the end, and it turns out before school.

The Gorans said that Vodokanal was informed of the incident and the flood caused a breakthrough at the airfield, but there was no possibility of access to the site of the damage during the weekend so as not to deprive residents of the settlement of water, it was decided to postpone the renovation until Monday and not to close the water.

Similarly, local residents report that until Monday night, there will be no heat and hot water, including in kindergarten.

Source:Verbal statements

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

27 December 2023
The schedule of buses will change to the next year ' s holidays

During the pre-lived and holidays in the Tver region, the blue buses will be scheduled on weekends.

For example, the schedule of work will change in the Tweri, Kalinin, Rzewski, Zubtsov, Kimra and Konakov districts.

In addition, the suburban buses in the districts of Kimra, Rjiv, Zubtsov and Staritzka on 30 and 31 December, as well as on 6 and 7 January, will be on the weekend schedule. From 1 to 5 January as well as on 8 January, on schedule.

According to the carrier, the weekend schedule implies that the schedule and interval of traffic will change along the routes.

As of 9 January, the Transport of the Supreme Reverend will return to normal operations.

Source:Beast

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

26 December 2023
Cosmonaut Sergei Korsakow gave the Governor a flag of the area that had entered the ISS.
Photo: Government of the Tver Region


Today, 26 December, at the International Exhibition of the Russian Federation, the Tver Oblast Day is held at the NSA. Igor Rudena, Governor of the Tower Region, visited the exhibition.

Other participants in the tver bench wereThe cosmonaut is from Kimre.Sergei Korsak. Sergei Vladimirich, in a solemn setting, gave the Governor of the Tver Region, Igor Ruden, a flag of the region that had entered the ISS.

♪ When I was asked what you wanted to take to the station, but only a little weight. The answer was obvious. I, of course, took the flag of the Tower region, noted Sergei Korsakov.

The Flag flew over 3,000 times.

Remind me, Sergey Korsak, ended the hymnasis number two in the city of Kimra. He spent more than 194 days in space last year. The Russian cosmonaut tester started on 18 March 2022 from the Baikonur cosmodrome on the ISS Solution 21 pilot ship as aboard engineer. On 29 September, he returned to Earth.

♪ For me, the brightest impression of the River is the Volga River, because I grew up on the shore of Volga. Busy, trying to swim the Volga, fishing, of course. I loved fishing with my grandfather. So for me, this is the main symbol, Volga, shared Sergey Korsak with his childhood education in the Tver region before the opening ceremony.

Tverigrad portal.ruinterview.The class leader of the cosmonaut, the Russian language teacher, the literature and the rhetoric of Galina Gerasimova. Galina Vasilievna confessed that he was proud of his student, a gymnasist from a small provincial town, who fulfilled his dream and went to stars.

10 April 2023 Sergei KorsakowVisited the Kimra Himnasia♪ At a meeting with schoolchildren, he spoke of the difficulties and joys of working in space.

Source:Tverigrad.ru

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

18 December 2023
In Kimrah, an ambulance й Video is stuck due to untreated roads
Kimra's video cadre is scandal, affair


On the eve, December 17, in the town of Kimra Tver province, an ambulance was stuck at the nursery hospital. The emergency car had to be lifted, four men pushed the car. The E.R. leader also had to push.

Little patients were waiting for hospitalization. According to eyewitnesses, it had even been necessary to call the MHS, the ambulance was delayed by a snowman for at least half an hour.

In the yards of the city of Kimra, the same catastrophe - for the medical team, every call to the sick turns into a whole quest, writes a disturbed population in social media.

Source:TIA

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

15 December 2023
At the Gorny factory in Kimrah, a new importation product started.
Photo: Government of the Tver Region


On 13 December, as part of the working visit of Governor Igor Rudeni to the Kimra district, a new cesha was opened at the KIMK Gorki factory. The site has a line of top-efficiency Meltblown filtering material for personal protection.

“Kimr enterprise has always been active in the life of the country. Today, the factory is involved in the development of the technological independence of the Russian Federation as part of the tasks set by the President. The enterprise goes up in time. During the pandemic, protective masks and other epidemiological safety products were produced. And today produces modern materials for the manufacture of competitive products”, Igor Rudena noted.

The capacity of the caes provides up to 2 tons of filtering materials per day. Support was provided by the region for the opening of the new line. The Industrial Development Fund of the Tver Region has been loaned to the factory under the Importation programme.

" The new line is not only new jobs and budgetary allocations, it is also a matter of technological security for us. And for our partners, defence, medical and other industries, guaranteed staff protection. I would like to thank the Government of the region and the Governor of the Twer region personally for seeing continued attention to our enterprise. We're not gonna fail. The Kimra Factory will always be a flagship for the production of quality protections, and underlined the Chairman of the Board of Directors of the AO, the Kimra Gorky Factory, Alexander Yakovlev.

Dmitri Bemov, Director-General of the German Gorny Factory, said that the launch of unique equipment provided a complete technological process for the production of modern materials to be used, including for the manufacture of their own SIZs. In 2024, an automatic line is planned for the production of 300+ SPIROs from Meltblown.

The Kimra Gorky Factory was founded in 1925. For more than 60 years, it is a specialized enterprise for the production of personal protection of breathing and leather bodies.

During the Great Patriotic War, the factory ' s team supplied uniforms to the Red Army. In time of peace, the enterprise provided personal protection to workers in the nuclear industry, medicine and other industries.

After the accident at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, the factory worked in three shifts, supplying non-avocable respirators and protective clothing to liquidators around the world.

During the fight against coronavirus infection, the production of necessary masks, respirators and special equipment was increased as soon as possible.

Today, the Kimra Gorny factory produces more than 100 species of anti-aerosol and gas-aerosol respirators and over 40 additional protective clothing. Since 2010, there have been innovative models of SPIRO respirators, whose production technology has been used for the first time in Russia. In 2022, the factory produced about 10 million respirators. The enterprise employs more than 400 professionals.

The main consumers of products are AO Concern Rosengergoat, AO Kuzbassrupgal, AO NPC Uralvagonzavod, PAO Severstal, PAO Magnitogorian Metal Combine, AO Ucalyn GO. Verkhnevolge articles are also supplied to Belarus and Kazakhstan.

During a working visit to the Kimra Municipal District, Governor Igor Rudena also launched the construction of the ARK-2023 dry cargo vessels on the White Navy and visited the Belarusian Secondary School.

In Kimrah, the head of the region inspected the availability of a child health clinic, held a meeting on the development of the Kimra Central District Hospital. In addition, Igor Rudena visited a gas-infected household this year in the village of Sainte, visited the work of the Kimre Medical College and hosted a personal reception of citizens.

Government of the Twer Region

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

14 December 2023
In the White City, Dane starts construction of dry cargoes to enter the White Sea
Photo: Government of the Tver Region


The night before yesterday, Governor Ruden, accompanied by the head of the Lukjanova District, visited the White Navy. It's been fixed-blooded.

But there's only three problems in the White Town:

    1. Water
    2. Heating
    3. Kanalization
The remaining problems, such as the absence of a doctor in the TPN, the improvement and the lack of funding, are small, against the background of these three points.

In a week, it will be exactly the year that Andrei Lukjanov, the head of the Kimre District, holds his office. And half a year, he promised to change the catastrophic situation with the VCF in the White City.

In the coming days, our channel will tell us how things started, how things started and what happened.

Source:It's Kimra and it's news.

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

25 November 2023
In the Kimra district of Tver province, a plane landed hard on ice
Photo: CCP-11


On 25 November, a light-motor aircraft landed strongly on the Volga surface in the Tiono-Kimr district. This is being reported to the Russian MHS PG on the Tver Region.

The plane landed 50 metres from the shore to the ice and partially failed the front. There was only a pilot on board who was able to get out of the dangerous zone on his own.

There's no fire, no casualties.

There is a team of KIMR, one PHS-11, an ambulance brigade and the police.

Source:True

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.
